title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS A beginner’s guide to gym terminology. How to restore your edible garden after fire. There’s a Netflix restaurant in Las Vegas. Beavers save the day! This is quite a chicken coop. This light installation must be amazing in-person. I daydream of being an innkeeper. This house is simply elegant. These Samoa Cookie Protein Balls look good! Scenes from the American Egg Shortage. Self-care is an act of resistance. I had no idea there were so many flavors of Lindt chocolate. Reading about chaotic discipline. I’m living it. Let’s look at ancient things for a perspective shift. Do you know you can make risotto in the instant pot? Why do some knives have dimples? I’m organizing my seeds with these. Post coming soon! I spent too much time browsing the seeds in this etsy shop. Photos of fashions from the 1980s. Weekend reading: Olivetti I love you printable for my paid subscribers on The Handwriting Club Substack. The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!
text: I LOVE LISTS  A beginner’s guide to gym terminology.  How to restore your edible garden after fire.  There’s a Netflix restaurant in Las Vegas.  Beavers save the day! This is quite a chicken coop. This light installation must be amazing in-person. I daydream of being an innkeeper.  This house is simply elegant.  These Samoa Cookie Protein Balls look good!  Scenes from the American Egg Shortage.  Self-care is an act of resistance.  I had no idea there were so many flavors of Lindt chocolate.  Reading about chaotic discipline. I’m living it.  Let’s look at ancient things for a perspective shift.  Do you know you can make risotto in the instant pot?  Why do some knives have dimples?  I’m organizing my seeds with these. Post coming soon!  I spent too much time browsing the seeds in this etsy shop.  Photos of fashions from the 1980s.  Weekend reading: Olivetti    I love you printable for my paid subscribers on The Handwriting Club Substack.
html:
I LOVE LISTS 

  1. A beginner’s guide to gym terminology. 
  2. How to restore your edible garden after fire. 
  3. There’s a Netflix restaurant in Las Vegas. 
  4. Beavers save the day!
  5. This is quite a chicken coop.
  6. This light installation must be amazing in-person.
  7. I daydream of being an innkeeper. 
  8. This house is simply elegant. 
  9. These Samoa Cookie Protein Balls look good! 
  10. Scenes from the American Egg Shortage. 
  11. Self-care is an act of resistance. 
  12. I had no idea there were so many flavors of Lindt chocolate. 
  13. Reading about chaotic discipline. I’m living it. 
  14. Let’s look at ancient things for a perspective shift. 
  15. Do you know you can make risotto in the instant pot? 
  16. Why do some knives have dimples? 
  17. I’m organizing my seeds with these. Post coming soon! 
  18. I spent too much time browsing the seeds in this etsy shop. 
  19. Photos of fashions from the 1980s. 
  20. Weekend reading: Olivetti 

 

I love you printable for my paid subscribers on The Handwriting Club Substack.
